verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:1
verses.text: The sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:2
verses.text: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:3
verses.text: And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:4
verses.text: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:5
verses.text: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:6
verses.text: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:7
verses.text: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:8
verses.text: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:9
verses.text: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
